price: 47. Ceux qui auront commis des injustices auront (à subir) un supplice avancé,[528] mais la plupart d’entre eux ne le savent pas.
arabic: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ عَذَابٗا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: [528] Avancé dans le temps : un supplice de leur vivant (dès avant leur mort).

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna lilladhīna ẓalamū ʿadhāban dūna dhālika walākinna aktharahum lā yaʿlamūna
